items.label: Your First Deployment: A Step-by-Step Guide

admin/notifications.title: Notification System
admin/notifications.description: Configure RAD Platform email notifications - deployment alerts, billing notifications, and system messages

admin/settings.title: Global Settings
admin/settings.description: Configure RAD Platform global settings - platform-wide configuration, policies, and administrative controls

admin/users.title: User Management
admin/users.description: Manage users on RAD Platform - assign roles, manage credits, monitor activity, and control access

billing/credits.title: Credits System
billing/credits.description: Understanding RAD Platform credits system - how credits work, pricing, purchasing, and managing your infrastructure budget

billing/subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
billing/subscriptions.description: RAD Platform subscription tiers and recurring billing - choose the right plan for your infrastructure deployment needs

billing/transactions.title: Transactions
billing/transactions.description: View and audit RAD Platform transaction history - track credit purchases, usage, and billing records

features/deployments.title: Deployments
features/deployments.description: Manage infrastructure deployments on RAD Platform - deploy, monitor, update, and delete cloud resources across AWS, Azure, and GCP

features/modules.title: Modules
features/modules.description: Browse and deploy infrastructure modules from RAD Platform catalog - pre-configured Terraform modules for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud

features/publishing.title: Publishing Modules
features/publishing.description: Publish custom infrastructure modules to RAD Platform - create, version, and share Terraform modules with your organization

features/roi-calculator.title: ROI Calculator Explained
features/roi-calculator.description: The ROI calculator is a tool designed to help you estimate the potential financial benefits of using the RAD platform. It works by comparing the costs of your current manual deployment processes to the projected costs and savings you could achieve with RAD.

getting-started.title: Getting Started with RAD Platform
getting-started.description: Get started with RAD Platform - enterprise-grade infrastructure deployment for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform using Terraform automation

guides/finance.title: Finance Guide
guides/finance.description: Welcome to the Finance Guide. This guide provides an overview of the billing and finance-related features available to you.

support.title: Support & Resources
support.description: Get help with RAD Platform - troubleshooting guides, support resources, and documentation assistance

tutorials/administrators/initial-setup.title: Initial Platform Setup
tutorials/administrators/initial-setup.description: A guide for administrators on how to perform the initial setup and configuration of the RAD Platform for their organization.

tutorials/administrators/user-management.title: User Management
tutorials/administrators/user-management.description: Learn how to manage users and assign roles as a RAD Platform administrator.

tutorials/advanced/multi-cloud-strategie.title: Multi-Cloud Deployment Strategies
tutorials/advanced/multi-cloud-strategie.description: Learn how to deploy infrastructure across multiple cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) using the RAD Platform.

tutorials/advanced/platform-architecture.title: Understanding the RAD Platform Architecture
tutorials/advanced/platform-architecture.description: A technical deep dive into the architecture of the RAD Platform, explaining how it integrates with Google Cloud services to automate infrastructure deployment.

tutorials/agents/agent-revenue.title: Tracking Your Agent Revenue
tutorials/agents/agent-revenue.description: A guide for agents on how to monitor module and user revenue on the RAD Platform.

tutorials/index.title: Tutorials
tutorials/index.description: Hands-on tutorials for learning the RAD Platform through practical examples and step-by-step guides

tutorials/partners/first-module.title: Publishing Your First Custom Module
tutorials/partners/first-module.description: A step-by-step guide for partners on how to create, publish, and test a custom infrastructure module on the RAD Platform.

tutorials/partners/module-versions.title: Managing Module Versions and Updates
tutorials/partners/module-versions.description: Learn how to manage the lifecycle of your custom modules, including versioning, updating, and handling breaking changes.

tutorials/partners/production-module.title: Creating a Production-Ready Module
tutorials/partners/production-module.description: Learn best practices for building high-quality, maintainable, and secure custom modules for the RAD Platform.

tutorials/users/first-deployment.title: Your First Deployment: A Step-by-Step Guide
tutorials/users/first-deployment.description: Learn how to deploy your first application on the RAD Platform. This tutorial guides you through selecting a module, configuring your deployment, and monitoring its progress.

tutorials/users/managing-credits.title: Managing Your Credits
tutorials/users/managing-credits.description: Learn how to manage your credits, and monitor your spending on the RAD Platform.

tutorials/users/troubleshooting-deployme.title: Troubleshooting Failed Deployments
tutorials/users/troubleshooting-deployme.description: Learn how to diagnose and fix failed deployments on the RAD Platform by analyzing logs and identifying common errors.
